content: निष्क्रमः {@--1@} Going out, coming forth. {@--2@} Departure from, exit. {@--3@} One of the Saṃskāras or religious rites; {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} taking out a child for the first time into the open air (which is usually performed in the fourth month of its age); चतुर्थे मासि निष्क्रमः <ls>Y. 1. 12</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> उपनिष्क्रमण also. {@--4@} Degradation, loss of caste, inferiority of tribe. {@--5@} Intellectual faculty.
